0.1.name: wordpress/jquery-post-preview
0.1.description: Live post preview on "Write/Edit post" page of WordPress admin area using jQuery. If you don't like WordPress built-in Visual Editor (because it puts a lot of unnecessary tags or by any other reasons), but you want to have live post preview like in Visual Editor, this plugin may be useful for you.
